name.en: Six Strike - Legendary Lord's Sextuple Impact
name.ja: <ruby>六<rt>ろく</rt></ruby><ruby>武<rt>ぶ</rt></ruby><ruby>式<rt>しき</rt></ruby><ruby>真<rt>しん</rt></ruby><ruby>伝<rt>でん</rt></ruby><ruby>天<rt>てん</rt></ruby><ruby>魔<rt>ま</rt></ruby><ruby>六<rt>ろく</rt></ruby><ruby>段<rt>だん</rt></ruby><ruby>衝<rt>しょう</rt></ruby>

text.en: If you control 3 or more "Six Samurai" Synchro Monsters with different names (the number of monsters required to activate this card is reduced by 1 for every 6 Bushido Counters on your field): Destroy all cards your opponent controls. If this Set card in its owner's control is destroyed or banished by an opponent's activated effect: You can Special Summon 1 "Six Samurai" monster or "Shien" Effect Monster from your Deck or Extra Deck. You can only use each effect of "Six Strike - Legendary Lord's Sextuple Impact" once per turn.
